law_text: Parking less than 20 m from a railway crossing
conditions: up to 2 hours
notes: Fine for parking closer than 20m to a railway crossing for up to 2 hours.

law_text: Parking less than 20 m from a railway crossing
conditions: for more than 2 but not more than 4 hours
notes: Fine for parking closer than 20m to a railway crossing for more than 2 up to 4 hours.

law_text: Parking less than 20 m from a railway crossing
conditions: for more than 4 but not more than 10 hours
notes: Fine for parking closer than 20m to a railway crossing for more than 4 up to 10 hours.

law_text: Parking on a bridge
conditions: up to 2 hours
notes: Fine for parking on a bridge for up to 2 hours.

law_text: Parking on a bridge
conditions: for more than 2 but not more than 4 hours
notes: Fine for parking on a bridge for more than 2 up to 4 hours.

law_text: Parking on a bridge
conditions: for more than 4 but not more than 10 hours
notes: Fine for parking on a bridge for more than 4 up to 10 hours.

law_text: Parking in front of an access to another building
conditions: up to 2 hours
notes: Fine for parking in front of an access to another building for up to 2 hours.

law_text: Parking in front of an access to another building
conditions: for more than 2 but not more than 4 hours
notes: Fine for parking in front of an access to another building for more than 2 up to 4 hours.

law_text: Parking in front of an access to another building
conditions: for more than 4 but not more than 10 hours
notes: Fine for parking in front of an access to another building for more than 4 up to 10 hours.

law_text: Parking in front of an access to another property
conditions: up to 2 hours
notes: Fine for parking in front of an access to another property for up to 2 hours.

law_text: Parking in front of an access to another property
conditions: for more than 2 but not more than 4 hours
notes: Fine for parking in front of an access to another property for more than 2 up to 4 hours.

law_text: Parking in front of an access to another property
conditions: for more than 4 but not more than 10 hours
notes: Fine for parking in front of an access to another property for more than 4 up to 10 hours.

law_text: Parking on the sidewalk where signals or markings do not explicitly permit it, if at least a 1.5 m wide space remains for pedestrians
conditions: up to 2 hours
notes: Fine for parking on the sidewalk without explicit signs/markings, even if 1.5m is left for pedestrians, for up to 2 hours.

law_text: Parking on the sidewalk where signals or markings do not explicitly permit it, if at least a 1.5 m wide space remains for pedestrians
conditions: for more than 2 but not more than 4 hours
notes: Fine for parking on the sidewalk without explicit signs/markings, even if 1.5m is left for pedestrians, for more than 2 up to 4 hours.

law_text: Parking on the sidewalk where signals or markings do not explicitly permit it, if at least a 1.5 m wide space remains for pedestrians
conditions: for more than 4 but not more than 10 hours
notes: Fine for parking on the sidewalk without explicit signs/markings, even if 1.5m is left for pedestrians, for more than 4 up to 10 hours.

law_text: Parking within the signaled parking prohibition (2.50)
conditions: up to 2 hours
notes: Fine for parking within an area signed with 'Parking prohibited' (Sign 2.50) for up to 2 hours.

law_text: Parking within the signaled parking prohibition (2.50)
conditions: for more than 2 but not more than 4 hours
notes: Fine for parking within an area signed with 'Parking prohibited' (Sign 2.50) for more than 2 up to 4 hours.

law_text: Parking within the signaled parking prohibition (2.50)
conditions: for more than 4 but not more than 10 hours
notes: Fine for parking within an area signed with 'Parking prohibited' (Sign 2.50) for more than 4 up to 10 hours.

law_text: Parking in a meeting zone at places not marked for it
conditions: up to 2 hours
notes: Fine for parking in a 'Meeting Zone' (Begegnungszone) at unmarked spaces for up to 2 hours.

law_text: Parking in a meeting zone at places not marked for it
conditions: for more than 2 but not more than 4 hours
notes: Fine for parking in a 'Meeting Zone' (Begegnungszone) at unmarked spaces for more than 2 up to 4 hours.

law_text: Parking in a meeting zone at places not marked for it
conditions: for more than 4 but not more than 10 hours
notes: Fine for parking in a 'Meeting Zone' (Begegnungszone) at unmarked spaces for more than 4 up to 10 hours.

law_text: Parking within parking bays
conditions: up to 2 hours
notes: Fine for parking within a marked parking space for up to 2 hours (implying non-compliance with parking field rules, likely time limit exceeded or similar).

law_text: Parking within parking bays
conditions: for more than 2 but not more than 4 hours
notes: Fine for parking within a marked parking space for more than 2 up to 4 hours.

law_text: Parking within parking bays
conditions: for more than 4 but not more than 10 hours
notes: Fine for parking within a marked parking space for more than 4 up to 10 hours.

law_text: Parking a vehicle in a parking bay when it is not sized for that vehicle type
conditions: up to 2 hours
notes: Fine for parking a vehicle in a space not designated for its size/type for up to 2 hours.
